subject: Boxing
Citizenship and Naturalization
Immigration and Emigration
Illegal Immigrants
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: The amateur boxer Erick De Leon needs U.S. citizenship to bring his champion fighting to the U.S. Olympic team in 2012.
snippet: The amateur boxer Erick De Leon needs U.S. citizenship to bring his champion fighting to the U.S. Olympic team in 2012.
